error.bad_config: Request failed due to bad config: Check at [stationboard]({stationboard_url}) if your station names are valid
error.too_many_via_stations: Too many via stations, only up to 5 via stations are allowed per connection.
error.unknown: An unknown error was raised by python-opendata-transport

abort.bad_config: Request failed due to bad config: Check the [stationboard]({stationboard_url}) for valid stations.
abort.unknown: An unknown error was raised by python-opendata-transport

data.via: List of up to 5 via stations

data_description.time_station: Usually the departure time of a connection when it leaves the start station is tracked. Alternatively, track the time when the connection arrives at its end station.
data_description.time_mode: Time mode lets you change the departure timing and fix it to a specific time (e.g. 7:12:00 AM every morning) or add a moving offset (e.g. +00:05:00 taking into account the time to walk to the station).

user.description:
Provide start and end station for your connection,
and optionally up to 5 via stations.

Check the [stationboard]({stationboard_url}) for valid stations.
user.title: Swiss Public Transport

time_fixed.description: Please select the relevant time for the connection (e.g. 7:12:00 AM every morning).
time_fixed.title: Swiss Public Transport

time_offset.description: Please select the relevant offset to add to the earliest possible connection (e.g. add +00:05:00 offset, taking into account the time to walk to the station)
time_offset.title: Swiss Public Transport

fetch_connections.name: Fetch Connections
fetch_connections.description: Fetch a list of connections from the swiss public transport.

config_entry_id.name: Instance
config_entry_id.description: Swiss public transport instance to fetch connections for.

limit.name: Limit
limit.description: Number of connections to fetch from [1-15]

invalid_data.message:
Setup failed for entry {config_title} with invalid data, check at the [stationboard]({stationboard_url}) if your station names are valid.
{error}

config_entry_not_found.message: Swiss public transport integration instance "{target}" not found.

options.departure: Show departure time from start station
options.arrival: Show arrival time at end station

options.fixed: At a fixed time of day
